title: Thoughts and tips on Kha'Zix
body:
I got Kha'Zix a while back from the free mystery champion you get from linking up to facebook but I haven't tried using him yet and I'm not sure he's any good, he seems a bit reliant on kills and doesn't have a whole lot of utility and his isolation mechanic seems like it won't help him much in teamfights.

Also is he stronger early game or late game?

replies.body:
I tried him out in a few games and the first game I went 9/1/6 (The only reason I died once was because they had a Warwick) and the second game I went 19/4/7 (Lol enemy was jungle Yasuo, mehehehe).

I must admit he dealt a lot more damage than I expected, and his ganks were decent due to his damage.
just build and play him similar to rengar
i didn't know you started this Daniel!!!

He's an early game champion that becomes strong late game with kills (like any assassin).

Like you said, he seems reliant on kills, and he pretty much (like Rengar and any Assassin).
IMO the best thing to do with Khazix is to either get a strong leash from your bot lane and gank level 3 OR start at you red buff and try a level 2 cheese gank/invade.
